name: Bitter Shock
preparation: Begin by chilling a shaker and a highball glass. Pour 1 oz of vodka into the shaker followed by 2 oz of chocolate milk, ensuring a strong and creamy base. Add 1/2 oz of water and 1 tsp of vinegar to bring a tangy twist. Sprinkle in 1/4 tsp of salt to enhance the flavors. Introduce 2 dashes of Tabasco for a kick. Shake well until the mixture is well-combined and frothy. Strain into the chilled highball glass.
garnish: Dash of ground dark chocolate and a small chili pepper
backstory: Inspired by the daring spirits who appreciate a beverage that challenges and surprises the palate, Bitter Shock combines the unlikely pairing of chocolate milk and Tabasco with a tangy splash of vinegar, encapsulated within a strong vodka base, aiming to deliver both bitterness and a spicy punch.
